prodNameC: 胺芐青黴素鈉及舒巴坦鈉
ingredientsDesc:
Ampicillin Sodium and Sulbactam sodium 
It contains the equivalent of not less than 90.0 percent and not more than 115.0 percent of the labeled amounts of ampicillin (C16H19N3O4S) and sulbactam (C8H11NO5S), the labeled amounts representing proportions of ampicillin to sulbactam of 2:1. It contains not less than 563 μg of ampicillin and 280 μg of sulbactam per mg, calculated on the anhydrous basis.
